content: Sorry! We all have opinions, sometimes they stink an sometimes they dont. Forgive me?
reply: Sorry! We all have opinions, sometimes they stink an sometimes they dont. Forgive me?
title: My Heart Bleeds

content: Thanks for the 411. God, please Bless American and all it stands for. Bless those who make decisions in Washington DC. Bless the highest ranking officer and those who feel their field is not so important. Please Father take care of our people wherever they may be-fighting for freedom. Bless those who can no longer fight and please, please, please Lord-look in on every veterans administration hospitals. Some may feel forgotton, some may feel negelected and some dont knw what to feel and to that I ask Lord please have Mercy. Southern Girl in Louisiana
